name: Max Speed (eXimius, riks, Ryan N, Nicholas Alesse, Bryophite, musicbycamo)
name_original: Max Speed (eXimius, riks, Ryan N, Nicholas Alesse, Bryophite, musicbycamo)
description:
Become the incredibly dashing, office chair-riding, extreme daredevil Max Speed as he dashes down a treacherous road in this thrilling endless racer.

  • Ride high into the air to perform stunning tricks and score big-time while avoiding the many obstacles in the way!
  • Try and go for the highest score against players all over the world with the online-connected leaderboard!
  • Have a blast from the past with the retro 420x380 resolution, emulating the look of a classic PSX screen. HD resolutions in 4:3 and 16:9 aspect ratios are available as well.

Enjoy and have fun!

Earn points by doing tricks while in the air; you can go airborne by driving off ramps scattered across the road. The more tricks you perform while in the air, the more points you'll be rewarded upon landing. Avoid obstacles on the road and in the air; if you hit an obstacle while airborne, you'll lose any points you earned before landing again! Go through rings to gain extra height and earn time back!

Reach the point goal to keep playing to the net round. The game ends if you do not reach the point goal before the timer hits zero. Try to go for a high score!

Keyboard Controls:

Controller Controls:

  • Nicholas Alesse: Lead Programmer, Project Manager
  • Benjamin Pielocik: Artist, Concept Artist, Environment Artist, Associate Programmer
  • Max "eXimius": UI Designer, Concept Artist, Graphic Artist
  • João Dias: Soundtrack Composer
  • Lilya Adad: Vocalist
